title: BJP mocks Congress leader Rahul Gandhi over ‘Theme kya hai’ remark, posts video - Times of India
content:
1. BJP mocks Congress leader Rahul Gandhi over ‘Theme kya hai’ remark, posts video  Times of India
  2. Rahul Gandhi Sounds Poll Bugle In Telangana, Come Contest From Hyderabad, Owaisi Dares Congress MP  India Today
  3. BJP Mocks Rahul Gandhi Over "Theme Kya Hai" Remark, Posts Video  NDTV
  4. BJP Mocks Rahul After Leaked Video Shows leader Was Clueless About What to Speak in Telangana Rally  Republic World
  5. How Rahul Gandhi is strategising a Congress comeback in Telangana  India Today
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: An unverified video starring Rahul Gandhi where he is seen asking fellow leaders what is the theme before a rally and tweeted by BJP's Amit Malviya on Saturday morning is the latest flashpoint between the two parties. The video was tweeted ahead of the Congress leader's rally in Telangana. In the video clip, the Congress leader, sitting alongside other party members, is seen asking, ‘What is the main theme today. Kya theme kya hai, exactly kya bolna hai (What is to be said).’
